resources.string: Nothing will work unless you do.
Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
If you can’t do great things, do small things in a great way.
The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me?
I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
I would rather be optimistic and wrong than pessimistic and right.
Quality is more important than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles.
If I am in a slump, I ask myself for advice.
You cannot be afraid to fail. It iss the only way you succeed - you are not gonna succeed all the time, and I know that.
